tweet.text: Sec. John Kerry became the first Secretary of State and highest-ranking U.S. official to visit Antarctica with his 2016 trip to the McMurdo Station and the Amundsen-Scott South Pole Station: https://t.co/xAG4MAGZk6 #ArchivesPostcard (1/2) https://t.co/j6j4yVUHHR
